Cookies Policy

Last updated: November 8, 2025

1. Introduction

This Cookies Policy explains how Realtime Biomatrix (“we”, “our”, or “us”) uses cookies and similar technologies on our website. By continuing to browse or use our services, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.

2. What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit a website. They help websites recognize your device and remember information about your visit, such as preferences or login details.

3. How We Use Cookies

We use cookies for the following purposes:

  • To ensure the website operates efficiently and securely.
  • To analyze site traffic and improve user experience.
  • To remember your preferences (e.g., login and language settings).
  • To provide personalized content and advertisements.

4. Types of Cookies We Use

Essential Cookies

These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. Without them, certain features may not work.

Analytics Cookies

They help us understand how visitors interact with our site so we can improve it continuously.

Functional Cookies

These cookies store your preferences to provide an enhanced and personalized experience.

Advertising Cookies

Used to deliver relevant ads and measure campaign effectiveness.

5. Managing Cookies

You can manage or delete cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality and performance of our website.
